review_blob: Great amount of hops, just the right amount of bitterness for IPA lovers. Very delightful for being 8.7% ABV.
Beautiful pale with lots of citrus flavors. I taste a lot of grapefruit in this one. Finishes strong and dry.
The brewer told me it was somewhere between a stout and black IPA in his opinion and I agree. It has a surprising amount of hops but is well balanced between hops and sweet, malty flavors.
beer_name: Lost Forty Forest King American Stout

review_blob: It has a great kick for a pilsner. Lots of flavor but still a refreshing, lighter beer.
